publicwhip.spmotion: * S3M-6079 Christina McKelvie: Well Done to Motherwell Collegeâ€”That the Parliament applauds the performance of Motherwell College in the Workforce Development Awards, sponsored by the SQA, where it was highly commended for its project, Chesapeake Efficiency Through Learning Partnership.
